name: @weather/backfill-observations
description: Backfill historical weather observation partitions into Athena

scripts.deploy: npm run build --workspace=@weather/backfill-observations && mkdir -p ../../lib/nodejs && rm -rf ../../lib/nodejs/node_modules && cp -RL ../../node_modules ../../lib/nodejs && sam build --config-env prod && sam deploy --config-env prod

author: Sam Younger
